name: Crate Succ
description:
Suck up all of the valuable crates before space goop consumes them all! Made in 48 hours for DJAM #4

~ ~ ~
Controls:
WASD / Space to move, mouse to aim vaccum, left click to succ.
Press Z to skip cutscenes and press ESC pause the game.
~ ~ ~
Testimonials:

WhyCardBoard: "It's like Celeste, but instead of being good it sucks dog cheeks."

TheWildShieldon: "No."

Aprzn123: "This game succ, you succ, consume b o x."

~ ~ ~

Considering speedrunning Crate Succ? Send the video to emcannongames@gmail.com!
